levels.description: <@ba.vdown>Stops attacking</>; Attack Range <@ba.vup>expands</>, the effect of this unit's second Talent increases to <@ba.vup>{scale_delta_to_one}</> times, and all enemies within Attack Range are <$ba.sluggish><@ba.vup>Slowed</></>. Heals all ally units within range for <@ba.vup>{attack@atk_to_hp_recovery_ratio:0%}</> of this unit's ATK every second
